code: const API="http://localhost:8080";export const createUser=user=>{return fetch("".concat(API,"/api/user"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(reponse=>{return reponse.json();}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};export const readUsers=()=>{return fetch("".concat(API,"/api/user"),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(reponse=>{return reponse.json();}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};export const readUserById=userId=>{return fetch("".concat(API,"/api/user/").concat(userId),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(reponse=>{return reponse.json();}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};export const updateUser=(userId,user)=>{return fetch("".concat(API,"/api/user/").concat(userId),{method:"PUT",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(reponse=>{return reponse.json();}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};export const deleteUser=userId=>{return fetch("".concat(API,"/api/user/").concat(userId),{method:"DELETE",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(reponse=>{return reponse.json();}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};
